00015 // INPUT_MODE_NOTHING   == do nothing
00016 // INPUT_MODE_TEXT    == text input
00017 // INPUT_MODE_INTEGER  == integer input
00018 // INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN  == up/down movement, enter selection
00019 // INPUT_MODE_LEFT_RIGHT == left/right movement, enter selection
00020 // INPUT_MODE_SLIDER  == slider, up/down movement
00021 // INPUT_MODE_OPTION  == option, left/right selection, up/down movement
00022 // INPUT_MODE_COUNTER  == counter, up/down movment
00023 enum inputmodes{
00024  INPUT_MODE_NOTHING,
00025  INPUT_MODE_TEXT,
00026  INPUT_MODE_INTEGER,
00027  INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN,
00028  INPUT_MODE_LEFT_RIGHT,
00029  INPUT_MODE_SLIDER,
00030  INPUT_MODE_OPTION,
00031  INPUT_MODE_COUNTER
00032 };
